about.title: About
about.content: I'm Fatima Zahra, a passionate and creative full stack development student based in Morocco. With strong roots in both frontend and backend technologies, I love crafting beautiful, responsive, and purposeful digital experiences. Currently working on personal projects like Greenly and and professional projects like Diva's Bloom, while building my dream coding agency Veyora.

items.position: Web developer at Euroweb Digital, Tangier, Morocco
items.description: Completed a remote internship where I developed a full e-commerce website using WordPress on localhost. I explored site architecture, customized themes, and integrated plugins, gaining practical skills and strengthening both my creativity and technical know-how.

items.position: Internship at Label Etudes, Tangier, Morocco
items.description: Assisted in technical project documentation and supported web-based tools used for civil engineering studies and site tracking. I honed my skills in project management and data analysis, contributing to the success of a real-world project.

Currently pursuing my studies in software development, focusing on both front-end and back-end technologies. Gaining solid foundations in programming, web development, and project management while working on real-world applications.

items.institution: Abdelmalek Essaadi University, Tangier - Bachelor's Degree in Human Resources Management
items.description: Pursuing a Bachelor's degree in Human Resources Management, where I am learning about organizational behavior, talent management, and strategic HR practices. This program complements my technical skills with essential soft skills for effective team collaboration and leadership.
Life and Earth Sciences, with honors.
